divs: Sighting Detailsi was taking my dog out to go the bathroom and i was looking up at the sky it was around 9-10pm so it was still a little light out, somthing amber like the size of a star was cruzing in a strait line coming form the southwest going northeast, it looked like it was low 1500 feet or so just a guess, and then it just flashed the britest florescent Blue then went back to the amber and i could hardly see it but it was still there, then was gone that fast never seen anything like it ever. i know it was not a commit cuz there was no tail of any kind it was the most vivid Florecent blue i have ever seen the blue light when it flashed was alot bigger then the oject it self Weird.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Valley City
There were no other sightings in Valley City on or around July 27th 2008
Summary: Starlike moving faster then a plain then flashed Floresent Blue and went dim again then disaperd
